name: Arkanoid (itch) (Lauks Lair)
description:
Classic Unity tutorial extended with some power-ups

White power up - Paddle gets bigger

Red  power up-Paddle gets smaller

Pink  power up- Ball gets bigger. Piercing effect

Green power up - Extra ball in the current  life 

Grey  power up- Magnet effect on paddle

Yellow power up- Increases ball's speed

How to play:

A,S - Move paddle  Space-Throw ball R- restart game
